title: Whole baked salmon with a dill mousse
ingredients: ['For the salmon', '2 bunches fresh watercress', '2 bunches fresh dill', '1 good handful fresh parsley, chopped', 'juice of 2 lemons', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'olive oil, to taste', '1 (3kg) whole salmon, gutted and cleaned', 'For the mousse', '1 bunch fresh dill', '150ml creme fraiche', '150ml extra thick double cream', '1 good handful fresh watercress', '1 tablespoon capers', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
